name: css-tree
description: A tool set for CSS: fast detailed parser (CSS → AST), walker (AST traversal), generator (AST → CSS) and lexer (validation and matching) based on specs and browser implementations

scripts.lint: eslint data lib scripts test && node scripts/review-syntax-patch --lint && node scripts/update-docs --lint
scripts.travis: nyc npm run lint-and-test && npm run coveralls
